content:
students say Women are all Yellow Jackets everyday

Saying that the Universitys Yellow Jackets program is not enough to make campus safe several area activists want women to wear yellow clothes today and carry fliers reading We are all Yellow Jackets everyday. the University launched the Yellow Jackets program early May in response to recent attacks against women on campus PERIOD The program consists of a team of volunteers who patrol campus at night and serve as the eyes and ears of the Department of Public Safety PERIOD

Its awesome that the Yellow Jackets is happening and that the University is doing something about campus safety said Lezlie Frye a junior studying history and womens studies who is helping organize the event PERIOD

Frye said she wants to see women actively work to make campus safe PERIOD

Were all Yellow Jackets  were all the eyes and ears on campus she said PERIOD Everyone should be on the lookout. darren Freeman



Student Senate officially ends

its  session

Michael Sherman Brenda Tincher Mike Linman Mena Ravassipour Eric Bailey and Theo Yang were confirmed as new members of the ASUO Student Senate at the final meeting of the  school year on Wednesday night in the EMU Board Room PERIOD

The Senate also approved Kate Kranzush as Senate president for the summer and Dominique Beaumonte as the Senate vice president for the summer PERIOD

In other action senators transferred funds within the Muslim Student Association to the food account to cover catering for a presentation last week put on by student funds PERIOD

They also transferred money within the ASUO Womens Center based on the groups accounting miscalculations last year PERIOD

Project Saferide shifted funds from gas to office supplies for the purchase of new chairs a disc drive and office supplies PERIOD

In the final transfer of the evening the Students for Choice transferred money to advertising and office supplies PERIOD

 Robin Weber

The Daily Emerald is the news division of Emerald Media Group University of Oregons independent student media organization PERIOD
